mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_bankcard_info (bank_id, bankcard_type, bankcard_name, bankcard_num, bank_name, bank_province, bank_city, bank_detailed, band_contact, business_uid) VALUES (#{bankId}, #{bankcardType}, #{bankcardName}, #{bankcardNum}, #{bankName}, #{bankProvince}, #{bankCity}, #{bankDetailed}, #{bandContact}, #{businessUid})
